title: WHIP-IT Good
body_text:
2007 GOLD AWARDS
Voting for the year-end
Gold Awards
will begin at DODGEBALL 116!
DODGEBALL LXXXI: CREAMation 1
This inaugural encounter witnessed members of the two most destructive families annihilate their supposed best friends. Valerie Winston and Kevin Adams defeated John Tronolone and Lenny Herrera in a classic.
*Alternate footage can be found
HERE
DODGEBALL 91: CREAMation 2
The loud-mouthed Diana DiBuccio suffered the consequences of not one, but two pies when rival captains Juan Londono and Justin Pierce capatalized on the mysterious disappearance of Tom Adams.
DODGEBALL 105: CREAMation 3
Chris Adams extracted a great deal of redemption, defeating nemisis Kevin Fitzpatrick in one of the sport's most thrilling return bouts.
...................
DODGEBALL 116: CREAMation 4
TRAVIS MILLS vs. RYAN MCCROREY
The ever-so popular
CREAMation Rules
is back and fighting to stay clean in this fourth meeting will be two of the most wildly intense maniacs ever! Can you say "unpredictable"?
This is no ordinary match-up, and not just because of the comedic stipulation, oh no ... for you see, both are Season 1 veterans and neither  have competed in a traditional captains contest in well-over one year. Plus, each were awarded the prestigious "Most Intense" accolade some eons ago.
MILLS History
The reckless legend has not had "lady luck" on his side, losing to "The Big Kat" Zach Katz and then-Captains Champion Joe Kelly at DODGEBALL 29 and DODGEBALL XL, respectively.
MCCROREY History
The equally reckless McCrorey defeated
Female Titan
Sara DeCuir in a grueling war at DODGEBALL X6, but came up short in his quest to take down the mighty Tom Adams at DODGEBALL 32.
It should be very interesting to see how all of these similarities play out. One thing is for sure though: DODGEBALL 116 will deliver yet another stellar performance from two established veterans. Who's getting "creamed"? Who' leaving clean?
Ah,
The Road to 120
. You gotta love it.
________________________________________
_________
DODGEBALL 117
John Tronolone vs. Tom Adams - the special Xmas main event on December 22.
DODGEBALL 118 / DODGEBALL 119: Double Header!
Mark Friday, December 28 and Saturday, December 29 on your calenders!
DODGEBALL 120
The climactical season finale extraganza on January 5, 2008!

DODGEBALL 91: CREAMation 2

DODGEBALL 105: CREAMation 3

DODGEBALL 116: CREAMation 4
TRAVIS MILLS vs. RYAN MCCROREY

The ever-so popular CREAMation Rules is back and fighting to stay clean in this fourth meeting will be two of the most wildly intense maniacs ever! Can you say "unpredictable"?

This is no ordinary match-up, and not just because of the comedic stipulation, oh no ... for you see, both are Season 1 veterans and neither have competed in a traditional captains contest in well-over one year. Plus, each were awarded the prestigious "Most Intense" accolade some eons ago.

MILLS History
The reckless legend has not had "lady luck" on his side, losing to "The Big Kat" Zach Katz and then-Captains Champion Joe Kelly at DODGEBALL 29 and DODGEBALL XL, respectively.

MCCROREY History
The equally reckless McCrorey defeated Female Titan Sara DeCuir in a grueling war at DODGEBALL X6, but came up short in his quest to take down the mighty Tom Adams at DODGEBALL 32.

It should be very interesting to see how all of these similarities play out. One thing is for sure though: DODGEBALL 116 will deliver yet another stellar performance from two established veterans. Who's getting "creamed"? Who' leaving clean?

Ah, The Road to 120. You gotta love it.
